definition: Mingshan district of Benxi city 本溪市, Liaoning
Ming Dynasty (1368-1644)/surname Ming/Ming (c. 2000 BC), fourth of the legendary Flame Emperors, 炎帝[Yan2 di4] descended from Shennong 神農|神农[Shen2 nong2] Farmer God
bright/opposite: dark 暗[an4]/(of meaning) clear/to understand/next/public or open/wise/generic term for a sacrifice to the gods
mountain/hill/anything that resembles a mountain/CL:座[zuo4]/bundled straw in which silkworms spin cocoons/gable
surname Shan
Mt Yangming in Hunan/Mt Yangming in north Taiwan, near Taibei
Mingshan district of Benxi city 本溪市, Liaoning

sentences.english: Yeah, do you know what type of people often come to visit Yangmingshan these days?
sentences.chinese: 嗯，你猜現在經常來陽明山的是哪些人？

sentences.english: No wonder. Last time when I went to Yangmingshan National Park, there was a smell of sulphur in an area.
sentences.chinese: 難怪我上次去陽明山國家公園時，聞到一股硫磺味。

sentences.english: We will picnic in mountain of Yangming.
Lily:You just want to save money. We always go to Yangmingshan. I am so bored of it.
sentences.chinese: 你就是不想花錢，每次都去陽明山，我都看膩了。

sentences.english: Last Sunday I went to Yang Ming Shan Park with my parents.
sentences.chinese: 上週日我和我的父母去陽明山公園。

sentences.english: Doris:There is snow on Yangmingshan. Let's go visit the mountain together.
sentences.chinese: 陽明山下雪了耶，我們一起上山去看好不好。

sentences.english: This is one of the most interesting sight during the early summer in the …
sentences.chinese: 這是陽明山區初夏的溪流中有趣的景觀。

sentences.english: We will take a trip to Yangmingshan on the eighth of April.
sentences.chinese: 四月八日我們要去陽明山旅行。

sentences.english: Yang Ming Mountain has some good hiking trails that are not too strenuous for the kids to climb.
sentences.chinese: 陽明山有些不錯的健行步道，小孩去爬也不會太費力。

sentences.english: It was initiated by Zhang Mingshan in late Qing Dynasty.
sentences.chinese: 它由張明山創始於清代末年。

sentences.english: For practicing our skills, we went to Mount Yangming to take pictures.
sentences.chinese: 我們到陽明山拍照以聯繫拍照技術。

sentences.english: In the afternoon, we climbed Daming Mountain.
sentences.chinese: 下午的時候我們去爬大明山。

sentences.english: Daming Mountain is located on the Tropic of Cancer and has its own positional characteristics.
sentences.chinese: 大明山位於北迴歸線上，具有其獨特的區位特徵。

sentences.english: Chungshan Hall, National Dr. Sun Yat-sen Application Form for Group Visit.
sentences.chinese: 國立國父紀念館陽明山中山樓管理所團體參觀申請表。

sentences.english: It's really nice, I can finally climb the Mountain Yangming .
sentences.chinese: 真棒，這樣我可以去爬陽明山了。

sentences.english: Ecological tour guide in Yang-ming-shan National Park.
sentences.chinese: 陽明山國家公園生態導覽。
